Question Text: Would you want this future or not? Please explain why.

Question Text: Would you want this future or not? Please explain why.
Response Text: I would not want this future because, while AI-driven recommendations can save money and reduce waste, the constant exposure to AI influence could be overwhelming. The fact that people are unknowingly subjected to thousands of persuasion attempts daily raises serious concerns about personal autonomy and free choice. A society where individuals must actively defend themselves against invisible manipulation feels more controlled than liberated.
